name: Space Lord X
description:
You're the Space Lord! You need to destroy the core of the enemy. Avoid the shield and missiles. Everytime you defeat the enemy, you'll move to the next level, but beware that you have to hit the core at least once every ten seconds or you'll go back to the previous level.

How to Play
  • ARROW KEYS: move the player, sides will rotate the player and UP and DOWN will move forward or backward
  • X or SPACE: to shoot!

Rate it on the Ludum Dare page!
